author: maraschmiedtcoinbasecloud0533
content:
Join us for a Fireside Chat w/ the EF this Wed at 11am ET to learn more about how SSVs can improve your eth2 infrastructure setup including staking provider, at-home validator and pool operator use cases and benefits.

RSVP here: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfyCWNQ6wnPmUFRrU6DVnF8jbP-fX-bMDUyxaXYJTxKBTniWw/viewform?usp=sf_link

Or join the livestream: https://youtu.be/MJj10GG5FqU
